column1: how to check my phone balance
column2: You can check your phone balance by dialing *123# or using our mobile app. Would you like me to guide you through the process?

column1: yes
column2:
To check your phone balance, follow these steps:

1. Dial *123# on your phone.
2. Wait for the automated system to respond with your current balance.

Alternatively, you can use our mobile app to check your balance. Just download and launch the app, then sign in with your account credentials.

If you have any trouble or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
